9 cv::Mat image;
10 geometry_msgs::Pose pose;
11 double mapSize=30.0;
12 double resolution_=0.1;
13 
14 void global2image(double global_x, double global_y, int* local_x, int* local_y){
15  *local_y = (int)((double)image.rows/2 + (double)(pose.position.y - global_y) / resolution_);
16  *local_x = (int)((double)image.cols/2 - (double)(pose.position.x - global_x) / resolution_);
17 }
18 void image2global(double* global_x, double* global_y, int local_x, int local_y){
19  *global_y = ( (image.rows/2) - (double)local_y + ((double)(pose.position.y) / resolution_)) * resolution_;
20  *global_x = (-(image.cols/2) + (double)local_x + ((double)(pose.position.x) / resolution_)) * resolution_;
21 
22 }
23 TEST(ImageSize,ShouldPass){
24 
29 
32 
33  int local_x;
34  int local_y;
35  double global_x;
36  double global_y;
37  int pixels = (int) mapSize / resolution_;
38 
39  // Create an OgMap which is a grayscale (mono) image of size pixels
40  image = cv::Mat::zeros(pixels,pixels, CV_8UC1);
41 
42  /* initialize random seed: */
43  srand (time(NULL));
44 for(int i = 0 ; i < 5000000 ; i++){
45  pose.position.x = rand() % (int)mapSize;
46  pose.position.y = rand() % (int)mapSize;
47  global2image((double)pose.position.x, (double)pose.position.y, &local_x, &local_y);
48  ASSERT_EQ(local_x, image.cols/2);
49  ASSERT_EQ(local_y, image.rows/2);
50  image2global(&global_x, &global_y, local_x, local_y);
51  ASSERT_EQ(global_x, pose.position.x);
52  ASSERT_EQ(global_y, pose.position.y);
53 }
54  // Let's check map size compared to allocation, just in case
55  ASSERT_EQ(pixels, image.rows);
56  ASSERT_EQ(pixels, image.cols);
57 
58  // Let's check the map is allocated all zeros
59  ASSERT_EQ(0,image.at<uchar>(0,0));
60 
61  // Draw a link from top left to botom right corner
62  cv::line(image,cv::Point(0,0),cv::Point(pixels,pixels),cv::Scalar(255,255,255),1);
63 
64  // Let's check the centre is now white (255)
65  ASSERT_EQ(255,image.at<uchar>(pixels/2,pixels/2));
66 
67 }
